activities: The Stride Rite Corporation is involved in the development and sale of lifestyle, fashion and performance brands for footwear and related accessories.  The Stride Rite Corporation’s operations include Saucony; Sperry Top-Sider; Stride Rite and Keds.  The data transferred by The Stride Rite Corporation includes data related to staff administration; accounts and records; advertising, marketing and public relations; membership records and crime prevention.  It includes data on customers, vendors and employees.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
industrysector: Footwear - (FOT)General Consumer Goods - (GCG)Sporting Goods & Recreational Equipment - (SPT)
personaldata: Staff Administration; Advertising, Marketing and Public Relations; Accounts & Records; Administration of Membership Records; Crime Prevention and Prosecution of Offenders.  This includes data on on customers, vendors and employees
